intro: Psychotria flavifolia, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 14,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of yellowish-white flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria flavifolia is also known for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its therapeutic uses.
